attributes.text:
Adds a button to the visu with which exactly a defined value for a short, as well as a defined value for a long key pressure, can be sent to the BUS, e.g. for recalling and storing scenes or driving roller blinds. (Short = stop, long = drive). The address for short and long term may vary.

2012

Christian Mayer
Handle a short tap event and send the value for short pressing the trigger to the backend. If there is no short threshold set, this send the value for long presses to the backend.
Handle a long tap event and send the value for long pressing the trigger to the backend.

Returns the (computed) value of the property sendValue.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #sendValue}.
(Computed) value of sendValue.

Returns the (computed) value of the property shortValue.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #shortValue}.
(Computed) value of shortValue.
Initial value for property sendValue.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property sendValue with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #sendValue}.
the default value
Initial value for property shortValue.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property shortValue with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #shortValue}.
the default value

Resets the user value of the property sendValue.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #sendValue}.

Resets the user value of the property shortValue.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #shortValue}.
New value for property sendValue.

Sets the user value of the property sendValue.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #sendValue}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property shortValue.

Sets the user value of the property shortValue.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #shortValue}.
The unmodified incoming value.
